title: Naa Onnu Ninaicha(Peechankai) Lyrics Peechankai
stanzas:
Peechangai Â Naa Onnu Ninaicha Song Lyrics
#Peechangai

[naan onnu nenaicha
hey nee onnu nenaikka
sendhil pola
naan summa irukka
koundamani pol
nee etti odhaikka

hey vedhala kai
enna therikka vidum kai
paramapadha paamba pola
en kaala vaarum kai

pogum paadha engum
aappa yaar vachadhu
nalla pona songu naduvil
beepa yaar pottadhu

kai mela yaeri saniyo
paai poturichche
kaiku etti vaaiku ettum
yogam kettiruche

Temple Run-a pola
ippa endhan vazhka
candy crusha pola
request kodutha kai

hey lefty paiya
you gotta Crazy kaiya
because of this
fun and jolly
came for me-ya
mindu onnu yosikkudhu
kai onnu pannudhu
vingo vanga singa songo
boom
